message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds a significant value of $1200000 to you, and we believe it would greatly benefit your endeavors. We are offering this remarkable asset to you at a special price of $1150000. This is an extraordinary chance to secure a high-quality product at a price that is just $50000 above its intrinsic value to you. We trust that you will find this offer compelling and look forward to discussing the details further with you.
